description.p: Get the date and time value NrOfMinutes minutes ahead of DateTime.

prototypes.prototype: AddMinutesToDateTime as T (DateTime as T, NrOfMinutes as N)

description.p: The number of minutes to add.
Returns the date and time value NrOfMinutes minutes ahead of DateTime.

discussion.p: The AddMinutesToDateTime function computes the date and time value NrOfMinutes minutes ahead of DateTime.

example.caption: AddMinutesToDateTime() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Now() AS Now, AddMinutesToDateTime(Now(), 90) AS Later FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:45:57 00 pm|10/10/2019 02:15:57 00 pm
